name: Dead Rogue
description:
You like Rogue-like games ? You like RPG games too ? Dead Rogue is made for you !

Dead Rogue will implement both Rogue-like and RPG main features.

For the moment, it is only a prototype with standards asset but full custom mechanics.

You can get the soureces here : Link

I will try to update this project as much as possible.

PS : I'm absolutelly not a graphic artist so try to don't juge the global graphic aspect.

PS2 : I'm searching a graphic artist to help me on this project. Leave a comment if you are interested.
